subject: Computer and Video Games
Concussions
Football
lead_paragraph: Madden NFL 12 will be realistic enough not only to show players receiving concussions, but also to show any player who sustains one being sidelined for the rest of the game.
snippet: Madden NFL 12 will be realistic enough not only to show players receiving concussions, but also to show any player who sustains one being sidelined for the rest of the game.
